sqlquery.name: SQL_WF_RelateIncidentSheet.query
sqlquery.select:
select /*COUNT*/ *
/*COUNT*/ from ( select baseschema, basename,baseId, basesn, contactperson requestuser ,a.basesummary,a.basestatus,basecreatedate , baseclosedate, TO_CHAR(a.basecreatedate / ( 60 * 60 * 24) + TO_DATE('1970-01-01 08:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') AS createdate, (case when a.baseclosedate is null or a.baseclosedate =0 then '' else TO_CHAR(a.baseclosedate / ( 60 * 60 * 24) +TO_DATE('1970-01-01 08:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') end ) closedate from bs_f_cbd_incident a where baseId not in (select baseid from bs_t_wf_relation where relatebaseid=#relationBaseID# or baseid=#relationBaseID# union select relatebaseid from bs_t_wf_relation where relatebaseid=#relationBaseID# or baseid=#relationBaseID# ) and baseId!=#relationBaseID# ) where 1=1 $customwhere$ order by basesn desc
